about_the_game:
Word Wizardry and Superior Strategy Await You
Embark on a roguelike deckbuilding adventure that combines the thrill of word crafting and deckbuilding strategy. Craft a unique deck of letter cards, collecting rewards and unlocking new cards with each victory. Battle your way through genre after genre until you reach the final boss and emerge victorious.

Become a Word Crafting Prodigy
In each turn of battle, take your word crafting skills to the next level. Choose from your collection of letter cards to create a winning word, selecting the ability of each card to determine your offensive and defensive power. With every card in your deck also serving as a letter, your deckbuilding decisions will greatly impact your word crafting capabilities. Master the art of word crafting and outsmart your opponents with the power of language.

Synergize for Success
Even heroes need a little help, which is why you'll embark on a journey to discover and purchase items and McGuffins to support your deck. With randomized options in each game, you'll need to find the perfect balance between your contrasting tools to create a seamless machine of synergies.

Discover a New Adventure with Every Playthrough
Embark on a highly replayable journey where every game brings new challenges and synergies to explore. As you progress, you'll unlock powerful new options for your characters and face off against dangerous new obstacles, keeping the excitement level high.

Join the Story of Paige Turner
Join the fictional novelist Paige Turner on her quest to write her next bestselling novel. Defy genre conventions and brace yourself for unexpected enemies and unique loot as you piece together a strange and captivating story. Play as different genre-based characters, each with their own strengths, weaknesses, and playstyles, in this epic adventure.
